Title: 3rd International Conference on Science & Technology for Sustainable Development (ICSTSD - 2016)

Paregraphs.H2: Jhulelal Institute of Technology  in association with Society for Technologically Advanced Materials of India (STAMI), Institute of Advance Technology, University Putra Malaysia, (UPM) organizes   3rd International Conference on Science & Technology for Sustainable Development (ICSTSD - 2016) - (24th - 26th May 2016)

Paregraphs.Text: Jhulelal Institute of Technology is governed by Samridhi Sarwajanik Charitable Trust with a noble cause of providing quality technical education to the students in Central India. The college has marched towards the pinnacle of glory through its remarkable achievements and laurels in the field of education with high quality and caliber. It envisages becoming an eminent institution through knowledge & research.

ICSTSD-2016 is an International Forum which provides a state-of-the-art platform to researchers in Science & Technology. It is coming up with its 3rd International Conference on Science & Technology for Sustainable Development (ICSTSD - 2016) from 24th to 26th May 2016.

We are pleased to inform you that Jhulelal Institute of Technology is organizing a Satellite Conference of (ICSTSD - 2016) on 26th May, 2016 at JIT CAMPUS. Inauguration session of the conference will be electronically shared between Malaysia and Jhulelal Institute of Technology .

It is one of the leading Global conferences for presenting novel and fundamental advances in the fields of Science, Technology & Humanity. It will serve to foster communication amongst researchers and practitioners working in a wide variety of scientific and technological areas.
The Conference covers all areas of Applied Sciences, Computer Science, Electronics Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and Civil Engineering.
The conference deliberation is being structured (but not limited) to cover the following themes

Lists.Value: Power Ouality Issues and its Mitigation Techniques

Paregraphs.Text: All papers should be submitted in the form of Microsoft Word file (*.doc).. Kindly submit your papers at icstsd2016@jit.org.in

The papers will be published the following International Journal International Journal on Recent and Innovation Trends in Computing and Communication (IJRITCC) Scientific Journal Impact Factor (SJIF) Value is 5.098, IC Value is 5.75, ISSN NO: 2321- 8169, www.ijritcc.org

Row.Cell: Delegates from academic Institute/ Students/Research scholars
